nodes.name: OneTimePayment
initialize

nodes.documentation:
@notice The default function. Triggers a payment when called by anyone and it
         automatically unschedules itself up from the payment delegate

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "only a wallet delegate can cancel the payment"

arguments.value: only a wallet delegate can cancel the payment

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "only a wallet delegate can cancel the payment"

nodes.documentation: @notice Cancels the payments and unschedules it from the payment delegate

nodes.name: cancel

devdoc.author: Joseph Reed
devdoc.details: This contract deploys a one time payment that can be registered to a payment delegate

params._amount: The amount of tokens to send when the payment is triggered
params._delegate: The delegate from which to pull payment
params._token: The token to send when the payment is triggered

devdoc.title: OneTimePayment Contract

cancel().notice: Cancels the payments and unschedules it from the payment delegate
